data.title: Melissa Archer Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Melissa Archer on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Melissa Archer including Betrayed By My Bridesmaid, Twisted Little Lies, â¦
data.text: Melissa Jean Archer is an American actress and writer. She is known for playing the roles of Natalie Buchanan on the ABC Daytime soap opera One Life to Live (2001 to 2013) and Serena Mason on the NBC Daytime soap opera Days of Our Lives (2014 to 2015, 2017). She won two Soap Opera Digest Awards for her role on One Life to Live. As a writer, she has worked on the Lifetime television films Twisted Little Lies (2021), Betrayed by My Bridesmaid (2022), and Newlywed Nightmare (2023).
